title: Meet The Guy Who's Putting Your Cat On The Map â€” To Prove A Point
teaser: Owen Mundy, an assistant professor at Florida State University, tells Audie Cornish and Robert Siegel about a project called "I Know Where Your Cat Lives," which aims to create awareness about internet privacy.
